about_the_game:
One day before the New Year, a girl named Violeta was drinking hot tea in her hut, but suddenly there was a rumble. Hurrying to go outside, she found a girl lying in the snow, frozen, with torn clothes and pointed ears.

It turned out that this was an elf who had fallen out of the sleigh, who was supposed to help Santa Claus give out New Year's gifts to everyone.

However, the elf turned out to be unusual, her magical power is focused on excited feelings. And in order for the elf to be able to return back and give out New Year's gifts, it is necessary to replenish her erogenous chakra.



Engage in physical passion, or, in other words, lesbian sex, to gain Orgasm points, which will allow you to unlock new sex scenes. The game offers both couple sex scenes and solo ones, such as masturbation. You can either control the erotic process yourself by pressing the ENTER key diligently, or set the sex scene to play automatically and peacefully watch.

  • 15 sex scenes of domination over your elf;
  • Free camera when viewing sex scenes;
  • Direct control of sex scenes;
  • Cute female characters;

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults (18+) only and includes:
• explicit and frequent nudity
• sexual dialog and scenes/scenarios
• vaginal, anal penetrative and non-penetrative acts
• consensual sex, female domination, lesbian sex

All game characters are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:

short_description: One New Year's Eve, a girl named Violeta was drinking hot tea in her hut when suddenly there was a crash. Hurrying outside, she found a girl lying in the snow, frozen, with torn clothes and pointy ears.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese
